Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Northbound Reroute near 75th/South Shore
ShortDescription: Northbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 76th, Greenwood, 75th and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute near Pershing/Indiana
ShortDescription: #39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Pershing/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Pershing/Indiana.

Eastbound buses will operate via Pershing, Michigan, 41st, Prairie and Pershing, then resume their normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via Pershing, 41st, Wabash and Pershing, then resume their normal route.


Allow extra travel time.
